task.title: How to Configure Generic JDBC Data Source Drivers

keywords.indexterm: Relational Databasesdata sources configurationgeneric JDBC data source

taskbody.context: Starting with version 17, comes bundled with Java 8, which does not provide built-in access to JDBC-ODBC data sources. To access such sources, you need to find an alternative JDBC-ODBC bridge or use a platform-independent distribution of along with a Java VM version 7 or 6. The following procedure shows you how to configure a generic JDBC data source:

step.cmd: Click the New button in the Data Sources panel.
Select Generic JDBC in the driver Type drop-down list.
Add the driver file(s) using the Add Files button.
